title: Beef braised in beer with classic English suet dumplings served with buttery mash
ingredients: 2 tbsp plain flour, seasoned with salt and freshly ground black pepper
150g/5½ oz smoked streaky bacon, cut into 1cm/¼in dice
650ml/23fl oz Irish stout, such as Guinness
salt and freshly ground black pepper
salt and freshly ground white pepper
1kg/2¼lb floury potatoes, peeled, washed and cut into 2.5cm/1in chunks
